column5: Our first floor large 3 bedroom condo is a quick walk to the beach. It will comfortably fit a large family or group. You'll be centrally located near plenty of restuarants and shops. You'll have access to a pool, volleyball court and playground.   Unit #149 Port Aransas STR # 283989
column8: 3 BDRM CONDO WALKING DIST TO BEACH
